abilities.name: Trifold Path of Shadow
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, that unit cannot be targeted by ranged attacks unless the attacking model is within 12".

abilities.name: Echo of the Ravenspire
abilities.rule: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this model’s unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove that unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Inspiring Commander
abilities.rule: If you include this model in your army, until the end of the battle, non-**CHARACTER** models in **ASSAULT INTERCESSORS WITH JUMP PACKS** units from your army have an Objective Control characteristic of 2 while they are not Battle-shocked.
